channel.title: Portfolios on Arian's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Arian's Portfolio

item.title: Space Shooter
item.description: Mobile Friendly Shooter built on top of the Phaser Framework. Features powerups and an online leaderboard.

item.title: Match 3
item.description: HTML5 Matching 3 Game. Set up to communicate with PHP backend for point based earning on Virtual Economy Sites

item.title: Orb Knight
item.description: Orb Knight-RPG, Featuring pets and a Realtime Battle System. Made for Google HTML5 Game Making Contest

item.title: Scratch Wars
item.description: Control your forces in this epic battle between Red and Blue!

item.title: VirtuaPet
item.description: A Modern Virtual Pet Site where players collect, train, and take care of pets! Written in PHP, made with Love.

item.title: Journey East
item.description: An epic MMO set in an original world, featuring Crafting, Raids, and PvP! Coordinated with a team of developers. Responsible for Client and Server Development. (AS3 and Java)

item.title: PiRPG
item.description: JRPG with a uniquely dynamic card based system. Project Manager, integrated development, art and QA, organizing workload and direction. Responsible for entire engine creation. Code followed best OOP practices to make card functions easily extendable.

item.title: RUPP
item.description: Fluid Web App built with AngularJS. Complete Route Based Navigations lend to a fluid user experience. NodeJS backend on top of SailsJS

item.title: Zombie Shooting Game
item.description: GPU Accelerated flash game developed with Starling.

item.title: Big Issues
item.description: A ‘Begging Game’ showing the issues of poverty and world hunger. Developed for the Charity Game Jam.

item.title: Ghoul Feeder
item.description: Powerup your ghoul in this kid-centric flash game!

item.title: GSOC 2014 - Wordpress
item.description: Worked with the Wordpress Organization on the Google Summer of Code Program to gamify and improve Glotpress

item.title: Merc 01
item.description: A fast paced, action-packed twin stick shooter made in pyglet with custom direct GL drawing for fast performance.

item.title: jSolar
item.description: A 3d simulation of the copernican solar system model, where users can move the camera as well as affix it to the different planets. Made with Three.js
